instructions:
Brown ground beef and drain fat. In a Dutch oven sauté the chopped onion in olive oil for about 6
minutes. Add remaining ingredients except cheese and chips. Simmer for 20 minutes. Sprinkle servings
with grated cheese and serve with chips. Serves 8.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) pinto beans in chili sauce
1 can (15 oz) whole kernel corn, undrained
1 can (14 oz) Mexican style stewed tomatoes, undrained and cut up
1 pkg Old El Paso taco seasoning
name: Mexican Stew
